sent.orig: Description: Beautiful Cerulean Blue ribbed silk with a box print in Berry, Midnight, and Gold.
sent.trans: Description框：美丽的蓝色带肋与西鲁林在贝里，午夜，丝绸和盒印刷金。

sent.orig: Many of the messages defined in this specification contain elements named name and description.
sent.trans: 在编程接口规范中定义的许多消息都包含了名为name和 description的元素。

sent.orig: These description elements are also permitted to be sent without an xml:lang attribute qualifier.
sent.trans: 这些description元素同时也允许不受xml:lang属性的限制而直接发送。

sent.orig: Description: The description of the state is a long description of the state.
sent.trans: 描述：状态的描述是关于状态的一个详细的文字说明。

sent.orig: Time is a human description of relative motions and particularly, a quantitative description of cyclic motions.
sent.trans: 时间是人类对相对运动的描述，特别是循环运动的量化描述。
